short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads and stores your EzCater order automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using EzCater, it is impossible to see what you added to the cart for the given day (as an individual employee). This extension reads the EzCater cart and stores the order locally for later retrieval
